description.name: Carpenter pencil + 7 refills
description.long_desc:
The 150 mm technical pencil with an automatic lead advance is an essential tool for every professional and DIY enthusiast. Designed for precise marking and tracing lines on various wood-based and construction materials, this pencil combines convenience, durability, and functionality.


Main Features:



  • Automatic Lead Advance: Allows for quick and convenient use without the need for manual sharpening.

  • High-Quality Body: Made of durable ABS plastic, it ensures longevity and resistance to damage.

  • Built-in Sharpener: The lead advance button is equipped with a sharpener, allowing for quick and easy graphite sharpening at any time.

  • Flexible Clip: Enables convenient attachment of the pencil to a pocket, notebook, or tool belt, keeping it always within reach.

  • Set of Additional Leads: The set includes a container with 6 black HB leads with a diameter of 2.8 mm.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Length: 150 mm

  • Lead Diameter: 2.8 mm

  • Graphite Hardness: HB

  • Length of Metal Tip: 40 mm

  • Material: ABS | Metal

  • Number of Leads: 1 in the pencil + 6 additional

description.name: Lawn Rake
description.long_desc:
Adjustable rakes made of carbon steel are excellent tools for efficiently collecting leaves, mowed grass, and other garden waste. Thanks to the ability to adjust the tooth spacing, these rakes are versatile and effectively handle various types of garden debris. Suitable for both leaves and mowed grass.


This model allows easy adjustment of the fan width in the range from 19 cm to 60 cm.

























Number of Teeth15
Handle Diameter19 mm
MaterialCarbon Steel
Adjustment of Fan Widthfrom 19 to 66 cm
Wire Diameter2.7 mm

description.name: Exctraction and fill pump 200ml
description.long_desc:
Our 200 ml manual fluid suction pump is an indispensable tool in everyday situations when precise and effective removal of fluids is necessary.


Main Product Features:


Capacity 200 ml:


Optimal capacity for efficiently removing smaller amounts of fluids.


Manual Operation:


Easy-to-use manual suction pump that does not require external power sources.


Practical Design:


Ergonomic shape for a secure grip and control during fluid suction.


Easy Cleaning:


The ability to easily disassemble the fluid suction pump facilitates cleaning after use.

description.name: 3-19mm Exterlnal Chamfer
description.long_desc:
An external deburring tool is a tool that allows you to effectively and precisely remove burrs from the edges of various materials. It is a type of milling cutter that you just need to insert into the drill thanks to the hexagonal shank / driver /.

Product features:

  • It has a blade made of tungsten carbide (YG8), which is very hard and resistant to wear.
  • It fits the 1/4" hexagonal holder and has a diameter range of from 3 to 19 mm.
  • It is easy to use - just insert it into the drill or screwdriver and press it to the edge of the element you want to process.

Product application:

Milling cutter designed for rounding, smoothing metal, wooden elements, etc. The main applications are rounding the threaded ends of screws or rods, removing burrs from the external edges of pipes, pins or bolts.

description.name: Inflator pump brass valve connector 8mm
description.long_desc:
A nozzle for pumping tires is a good solution for the wheels of your car, bike or motorcycle. This nozzle is made of high-quality brass, which ensures resistance to corrosion, mechanical damage and high pressure. It fits most standard pumps and valves, and its hose diameter of 8mm allows for quick and easy pumping of wheels of different sizes. You don’t have to worry about losing air in your tires!

Product features:

  • Made of high-quality brass, which ensures resistance to corrosion, mechanical damage and high pressure
  • Fits most standard pumps and valves
  • Hose diameter of 8mm allows for quick and easy pumping of wheels of different sizes
  • Does not cause air loss, leakage.

description.name: 45degree angle brass inflator pump valve extension
description.long_desc:
An extension tip for inflating is an essential gadget for every driver who cares about the proper pressure in the tires. Thanks to it, you can easily inflate wheels whose valves are hard to access or hidden under hubcaps and have a diameter of 8mm. The 90° bent extension fits all standard valves and ensures easy and quick connection to the pump. Made of high-quality copper, it is resistant to damage and corrosion. Seals on both ends prevent air leakage and guarantee accurate pressure measurement.

Product specification:

  • Valve bending angle: 45°
  • Thread diameter: 8 mm
  • Material: brass
  • Purpose: delivery, heavy-duty, special vehicles, buses

Product characteristics:

  • It allows inflating valves with difficult access (e.g. twin wheel valves of delivery, heavy-duty, bus vehicles, etc.).
  • Bent at 45°, it fits all standard valves.
  • Made of solid brass with a metallic finish, it is resistant to damage and corrosion.
  • It has seals on both ends, preventing air leakage and guaranteeing accurate pressure measurement.
  • It has a knurled surface that facilitates screwing.

description.name: Inflator pump brass valve connector 8mm (clip-on)
description.long_desc:
A tip for inflating wheels is a reliable and durable tool that will help you maintain the proper pressure in your tires. The connector with an internal thread of 1/4’’ ensures a stable and tight connection with the pump, and thanks to the snap, you can quickly and easily mount and remove it. The brass material provides resistance to corrosion and mechanical damage. It fits standard valves with a diameter of 8mm, which are commonly used in cars and bikes. This way you don’t have to worry about fitting and tightness when inflating your wheels. The tip is a product that will satisfy every driver and cyclist.

Product characteristics:

  • It facilitates maintaining the proper pressure in the tires and ensures a safe and comfortable ride.
  • The brass material provides resistance to corrosion and mechanical damage.
  • It fits standard valves with a diameter of 8mm, which are commonly used in cars and bikes.
  • The connector with an internal thread of 1/4’’ ensures a stable and tight connection with the pump, thanks to the snap, you can quickly and easily mount and remove it.

description.name: Twin hold-on inflator pump long valve connector 1/4 8mm
description.long_desc:
A long tip for inflating wheels - universal and practical. This tip with a car valve of 8mm diameter is ideal for twin wheels in trucks and vans. Thanks to the fact that it is double-sided and open, you can inflate wheels from both sides without any problem. The connector with an internal thread of 1/4’’ ensures a stable and tight connection with the pump.

Product characteristics:

  • 8mm diameter, which allows easy access to hard-to-reach places.
  • It is a product designed to facilitate inflating double wheels in heavy-duty, bus, agricultural and other vehicles.
  • The connector with an internal thread of 1/4’’ ensures a stable and tight connection with the pump.
  • It is double-sided and open, you can inflate wheels from both sides without any problem.

description.name: 36pcs air pump accessories set
description.long_desc:
A set of tips, adapters and reducers for pumping is an essential ally for every cyclist. If you like active outdoor recreation, this set is for you. It is a universal solution that will allow you to inflate everything you need. Whether you ride a bike, play ball or relax on a mattress, you will always have the right tip for pumping. It contains 36 elements that fit different types of valves. A set of tips, adapters and reducers for pumping is a guarantee of comfort and safety during every adventure.

Product characteristics:

  • The set contains 36 elements that fit different types of valves.
  • The set is made of high-quality materials, which guarantees its durability and reliability.
  • The set is easy to use and store, thanks to the practical bag included in the set.
  • The set is essential for every cyclist who likes active outdoor recreation.

Elements of the set:

  • Spare seals
  • Nuts for valves
  • Tips for inflatable items
  • Adapter for SV valves
  • Adapter for AV valves
  • Adapter for DV valves
  • Needle for pumping
  • Nozzle for pumping

description.name: 8pcs air pump accessories set (needles, hose and adapters)
description.long_desc:
A set of pump tips is an ideal solution for anyone who needs to inflate a ball, mattress, bike. This set contains 8 elements, which allows you to quickly and easily inflate various items. The set is compatible with most pumps available on the market and fits different types of valves. Made of durable and safe materials. A set of pump tips is an essential gadget for every athlete, tourist, driver and household member.

Product characteristics:

  • The set contains 8 elements, which allows you to quickly and easily inflate various items.
  • It is compatible with most pumps available on the market and fits different types of valves.
  • Made of durable and safe materials.

Elements of the set:

  • 1 hose
  • 1 adapter
  • 1 plastic tip
  • 5 needles

A set of pump tips is an essential gadget for every athlete, tourist, driver and household member.

Product characteristics:

  • The set contains 8 elements, which allows you to quickly and easily inflate various items.
  • It is compatible with most pumps available on the market and fits different types of valves.
  • Made of durable and safe materials.

Elements of the set:

  • 1 hose
  • 1 adapter
  • 1 plastic tip
  • 5 needles

category.name: Tools for Wheels and Tires
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Service Equipment\Tools for Wheels and Tires

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Service Equipment\Tools for Wheels and Tires

description.name: Digital pressure gauge with a hose
description.long_desc:
Digital tire pressure gauge - electronic with hose is a simple and accurate way to check the pressure in your car tires. This modern and practical device allows you to quickly and easily measure the pressure in your tires, thanks to the digital LCD display and rotating head with a 45-degree tip. It is compatible with many types of car tires and has a measuring range from 0 to 200 psi, 0 to 1380 kPa, 0 to 13.8 bar and 0 to 14.06 kg/cm2. The pressure gauge is an essential gadget for every driver who cares about the condition of their vehicle and wants to avoid unpleasant surprises on the road.

Technical specifications:

  • Measuring range: 0-200 psi, 0-1380 kPa, 0-13.8 bar and 0-14.06 kg/cm2
  • Measurement resolution: 0.01 bar
  • Accuracy: in accordance with ANSI B 40.1 Class A, i.e. ±2-1-2% of range
  • Hose: flexible, rubber, 30 cm long
  • Power supply: 2 x 1.5 V batteries (AAA / R03), easy to replace
  • Display: digital, LCD, with backlight
  • Dimensions: 110 mm x 76 mm x 32 mm (without hose)

Product features:

  • Digital tire pressure gauge - electronic with hose is a simple and accurate way to check the pressure in your car tires.
  • This modern and practical device allows you to quickly and easily measure the pressure in your tires, thanks to the digital LCD display and rotating head with a 90-degree tip.
  • It is compatible with many types of car tires and has a measuring range from 0 to 200 psi, 0 to 1380 kPa, 0 to 13.8 bar and 0 to 14.06 kg/cm2.
  • It is equipped with an alarm function, which automatically signals the exceeding of the pressure in the tires, ensuring safety and fuel economy.

description.name: Digital pressure gauge
description.long_desc:
Digital tire pressure gauge - electronic is a modern device that allows you to quickly and accurately check the pressure in your car tires. Thanks to it, you can take care of safety and fuel economy while driving. It has a simple and ergonomic design, easy to use LCD display and rotating head with a 45-degree tip. It can measure pressure in four units: psi, kPa, bar and kg/cm2. It is resistant to low and high temperatures, and its accuracy is ±2-1-2% of range. The pressure gauge is an essential gadget for every driver who wants to be sure that their tires are properly inflated.

Technical specifications:

  • Measuring range: 0-200 psi, 0-1380 kPa, 0-13.8 bar and 0-14.06 kg/cm2
  • Measurement resolution: 0.01 bar
  • Measurement accuracy: ±2-1-2% of range
  • Head: Rotating (360°) with a tip set at a 45-degree angle
  • Power supply: 2x 1.5V batteries (AAA / R03)
  • Dimensions: 133mm X 76mm X 32mm

Product features:

  • It has a simple and ergonomic design, easy to use LCD display and rotating head with a 45-degree tip.
  • It can measure pressure in four units: psi, kPa, bar and kg/cm2.
  • It is resistant to low and high temperatures, and its accuracy is ±2-1-2% of range.
  • The product comes with a fabric case, which provides additional protection and ease of storage.
  • The pressure gauge is equipped with memory measurement and reset valve, which allow you to compare and correct the pressure in the tires.
  • It has a rubber frame, which protects it from mechanical and thermal damage.

description.name: Presta/bike brass adapter for inflating wheels
description.long_desc:
Presta/bicycle adapter for pumping wheels is an essential gadget for every cyclist. Thanks to it, you can easily and quickly pump up the wheels of your bike. The adapter is made of high-quality brass, which ensures durability and corrosion resistance. The adapter fits all types of presta and bicycle valves, and its installation is simple and intuitive.

Product features:

  • The adapter is compatible with presta and bicycle valves
  • Made of brass, which is durable and corrosion-resistant
  • It is easy to install and use

description.name: Inflator pump brass valve connector 8mm 1/4"
description.long_desc:
The brass tire inflator nozzle is the perfect tool for maintaining optimal tire pressure!


Here's why you should choose it:



  • Sturdy Construction: Our nozzle is made of durable brass, ensuring long-lasting durability and resistance to corrosion.

  • Standard Connection: The outlet diameter is 8 mm, perfect for inflating tires equipped with car valves.

  • Universal Thread: With a 1/4 inch connection thread, our nozzle fits many types of inflator guns. It's a convenient solution for everyone!

  • Secure Locking Clip: Our nozzle is equipped with a locking clip that holds it in the correct position during inflation, eliminating the risk of accidental detachment.


Technical Specifications:


Material: brass body, steel clip


Outlet Diameter: 8 mm


Connection Thread: internal 1/4”

description.name: Car trunk organizer
description.long_desc:
Our trunk organizer bag with compartments is an excellent solution for those who want to maintain order in the car and easily organize transported items.


Main Product Features:


Well-Designed Structure with Compartments:
The bag is equipped with multiple compartments, allowing you to precisely organize and separate different items, such as tools, car accessories, groceries, or recreational equipment.


Durable Construction Materials:
Made from durable and wear-resistant material, the bag will protect your items from damage during transport.


Easy Installation and Removal:
The bag is equipped with sturdy fasteners or straps that allow easy attachment to the car trunk and quick removal when the bag is not needed.


Universal Application:
Excellent for storing tools, travel accessories, sports equipment, or groceries. Also ideal for families to maintain order during trips.


Ergonomic Handles and Straps:


The bag has convenient handles and straps for easy carrying and transportation, even when fully loaded.

description.name: Tailor's sewing meter 150cm + case
description.long_desc:
A tailor’s measure in a case is an essential gadget for every tailor, seamstress, fashion designer and sewing enthusiast. This practical and handy measure allows for accurate measurements of fabrics, clothes, body and other objects.

Dimensions: 150x1.8cm

Product features:

  • Practical and handy tailor’s measure for measuring fabrics, clothes, body and other objects
  • Durable and non-wearing tape with clear digits and scale in centimeters and inches

  • Finished with metal tips, which prevent fraying and facilitate precise fitting

  • Packed in an elegant case, which protects the measure from dirt and damage

description.name: Winter windshield anti-frost mat 150x70cm
description.long_desc:
Anti-frost mat for the windshield with screen dimensions 150x70 cm is reliable protection against harsh weather conditions, especially in winter. Its solid construction made of coated aluminum makes it not only durable, but also easy to assemble and disassemble.


Durable construction: The mat is made of durable, coated aluminum, which guarantees resistance to extreme weather conditions.


Easy assembly and disassembly: You can easily mount the mat on the windshield - the mat has side flaps that you can easily close with the car door. A simple assembly and disassembly procedure makes it possible to quickly adapt the mat to changing weather conditions.
description.short_desc:

description.name: Winter windshield anti-frost mat with magnets 170x120cm
description.long_desc:
Anti-frost mat for the windshield with screen dimensions 170x120 cm is reliable protection against harsh weather conditions, especially in winter. Its solid construction made of coated aluminum makes it not only durable, but also easy to assemble and disassemble.


Durable construction: The mat is made of durable, coated aluminum, which guarantees resistance to extreme weather conditions.


Easy assembly and disassembly: The mat is equipped with strong ferrite magnets sewn into special protective pockets so that they do not damage the paint. Placed in appropriate mounting points, which will allow for accurate installation of the mat on the car windshield. Additionally, the mat has side flaps that can be easily slammed shut by a car door.

description.name: Continuous rim diamond blade 125x7.5x22.23mm
description.long_desc:
Profesjonalna tarcza diamentowa marki Tvardy. Tarcza o profilu pełnym przeznaczona jest do cięcia twardych materiałów budowlanych takich jak: gres porcelanowy, marmur, dachówki, granit, piaskowiec, kwarc. Tarcza diamentowa o średnicy 125mm i grubości 1,2mm. Posiada nasyp diamentowy o wysokości 7,5mm oraz grubości 1,6mm.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • profesjonalna tarcza diamentowa o wysokiej koncentracji diamentu, zapewnia szybkie i wydajne cięcie

  • nasyp diamentowy o wysokości 7,5mm i grubości 1,6mm

  • tarcza o średnicy 125mm i otworze montażowym 22,23mm doskonale sprawdzi się podczas pracy ze szlifierką kątową

  • przeznaczona do cięcia takich materiałów jak: gres porcelanowy, marmur, dachówki, granit, piaskowiec, kwarc

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Marka: Tvardy

Średnica: 125 mm

Otwór montażowy: 22,23 mm

Profil tarczy: ciągły (pełny)

Wysokość nasypu: 7,5 mm

Grubość diamentu: 1,6 mm

Grubość tarczy: 1,2 mm

Maksymalna prędkość obrotowa: 12 500 obr./min

Przeznaczenie Rodzaj tarczy

PEŁNA
T00801

 TURBO
T00802
T00813
T00814		 SEGMENT
T00803
T00810
T00812

DO GRESU

T00816
T00817
T00818
T00819

Profil tarczy: ciągły (pełny)

Wysokość nasypu: 7,5 mm

Grubość diamentu: 1,6 mm

Grubość tarczy: 1,2 mm

Maksymalna prędkość obrotowa: 12 500 obr./min

description.name: Turbo diamond blade 125x10x22.23mm
description.long_desc:
Profesjonalna tarcza diamentowa marki Tvardy. Tarcza o profilu TURBO przeznaczona jest do cięcia materiałów budowlanych takich jak: beton, żelbeton, cegła, kamień murowany, chodnik, marmur, granit, piaskowiec, asfalt. Tarcza diamentowa o średnicy 125mm i grubości 1,4mm. Posiada nasyp diamentowy o wysokości 10mm oraz grubości 2,4mm.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • profesjonalna tarcza diamentowa o wysokiej koncentracji diamentu, zapewnia szybkie i wydajne cięcie

  • nasyp diamentowy o wysokości 10mm i grubości 2,4mm

  • tarcza o średnicy 125mm i otworze montażowym 22,23mm doskonale sprawdzi się podczas pracy ze szlifierką kątową

  • przeznaczona do cięcia takich materiałów jak: beton, żelbeton, cegła, kamień murowany, chodnik, marmur, granit, piaskowiec, asfalt

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Marka: Tvardy

Średnica: 125 mm

Otwór montażowy: 22,23 mm

Profil tarczy: Turbo

Wysokość nasypu: 10 mm

Grubość diamentu: 2,4 mm

Grubość tarczy: 1,4 mm

Maksymalna prędkość obrotowa: 12 500 obr./min

Przeznaczenie Rodzaj tarczy
